name: The Journey Begins
description: You stand at a crossroads. The path ahead is filled with mystery, but the thrill of adventure courses through your veins.

choices.description: This road is dark and narrow, shrouded in shadows.
You glimpse a faint light glowing in the distance.

name: Mysterious Discovery
description: Within an ancient chest, you discover a gleaming artifact that pulses with otherworldly energy.

choices.description: It feels warm to the touch and seems to contain hidden power.
Better not to meddle with objects of unknown origin.
